title: PTV News to start digital transmission next month: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 12 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Wednesday said PTV News would begin digital transmission next month.
In a tweet, he said now PTV was also available on YouTube.
PTV News is now available on @YouTube plz follow link https://t.co/Zcg9dS3pky also HD transmission ll start from June, Radio and TV revamping underway people will see change in two to three months Inshallah
â€” Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) May 12, 2021
Fawad said revamping of Pakistan Television (PTV) and Radio Pakistan was underway and the people would see changes in next few months.
